Sequence Information.Peptide Name: DFT529 (Synthetic AMPs, DFTamP1 variant, Leu-rich; XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is poorly similar (92.31%) toDFT514. L: 38%.Chemical modification:  C-terminal amidation.Activity: Active against S. aureus USA300 (MIC 25 uM), P-aeruginosa PAO1 (MIC > 25 uM), E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 25 uM), and K-pneumonia ATCC13883 (MIC >25 uM).Toxicity:  human RBC HC50 >50 uM.
Literature Information.Author: Mishra B, Lakshmaiah Narayana J, Lushnikova T, Wang X, Wang G. 2019
Literature Information.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2019 Jul 2;116(27):13517-13522. doi: 10.1073/pnas.1821410116.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Low cationicity is important for systemic in vivo efficacy of database-derived peptides against drug-resistant Gram-positive pathogens
